patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -10,16 +10,16 @@
   database: {
     DB1_NAME: env.DB1_NAME,
     DB1_USER: env.DB1_USER,
     DB1_PASSWORD: env.DB1_PASSWORD,
-    DB1_HOST: env.DB1_HOST,
-    DB1_PORT: env.DB1_PORT,
+    DB1_HOST: env.DB1_HOST||"API_MYSQL",
+    DB1_PORT: env.DB1_PORT||3306,
 
     DB2_NAME: env.DB2_NAME,
     DB2_USER: env.DB2_USER,
     DB2_PASSWORD: env.DB2_PASSWORD,
-    DB2_HOST: env.DB2_HOST,
-    DB2_PORT: env.DB2_PORT,
+    DB2_HOST: env.DB2_HOST||"API_MYSQL",
+    DB2_PORT: env.DB2_PORT||3306,
   },
 };
 
 export default envFiles;
